tool.name: AnnotatePeaks

annotatePeaks_wrapper.sh -f $inputfile -y $log -c $controlfile -x $statsControl -o $outputPDF -m $minScore -l $left -r $right -d $DownGene -h $EnhLeft -u $stats -v $input_organism.version -p 1 #elif str( $if_PDF ) == '1' and $use_reg.use_reg_selector == "yes" and $use_control.use_control_selector == "no" # annotatePeaks_wrapper.sh -y $log -f $inputfile -e $regfile -m $minScore -l $left -o $outputPDF -r $right -d $DownGene -h $EnhLeft -u $stats -v $input_organism.version -p 1 #elif str( $if_PDF ) == '1' and $use_reg.use_reg_selector == "yes" and $use_control.use_control_selector == "yes" # annotatePeaks_wrapper.sh -f $inputfile -c $controlfile -x $statsControl -l $left -y $log -o $outputPDF -m $minScore -r $right -d $DownGene -h $EnhLeft -u $stats -v $input_organism.version -e $regfile -p 1#end if

param.name: minScore
param.label: MinimalScore
param.help: Set to 0 if you don't want to filter your .BED file with peaks

param.name: left
param.label: Define Promoter is a region up to X bp upstream gene TSS

param.name: right
param.label: Define Immediate Downstream is a region up to X bp downstream gene TSS

param.name: EnhLeft
param.label: Define Enhancer is a region up to X bp upstream gene TSS

param.name: DownGene
param.label: Define Gene Downstream is a region up to X bp downstream transcription end

param.name: use_reg_selector
param.label: Use transcriptomic data (up- and down- regulated genes)

param.name: regfile
param.label: File with information about gene regulation

param.name: if_PDF
param.label: Do you want to have a PDF image (default PNG)?

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool annotates peaks with genomic feature (promoter, enhancer, exon, intron, etc.) and creates a .png file with distribution
